CSL_EpwmChopperCfg Struct Reference
IP » EPWM

Structure holding the configuration parameters of Chopper sub-module. More...

#include <csl_epwm.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t dutyCycle
 
uint32_t clkFrequency
 
uint32_t oneShotPulseWidth
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding the configuration parameters of Chopper sub-module.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_EpwmChopperCfg::clkFrequency

Chopping clock frequency. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmChpClkFreq_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmChopperCfg::dutyCycle

Chopping clock duty cycle. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmChpDutyCycle_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmChopperCfg::oneShotPulseWidth

One shot pulse width: pulse width of first pulse. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmChpOshtWidth_t.
